allow:
Bash(/Applications/Blender.app/Contents/MacOS/Blender --background --python-expr "
import bpy

# Clear default scene
bpy.ops.wm.read_factory_settings\(use_empty=True\)

# Import the holding walk animation FBX
bpy.ops.import_scene.fbx\(filepath=''/Users/elliot/Downloads/Farming Pack/holding walk.fbx''\)

# Export as GLB with animation
bpy.ops.export_scene.gltf\(
    filepath=''/Users/elliot/dev/tools/garden-tool/public/models/anim-walk.glb'',
    export_format=''GLB'',
    export_animations=True
\)
print\(''Walk animation exported!''\)
")

Bash(git -C /Users/elliot/.dotfiles commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Simplify Tailscale URL format in serve skill

Use just the machine name \(e.g., elliots-macbook-air:5173\) instead of
the full DNS name for cleaner, shorter URLs.
EOF
\)")
